```{r}
min(wr$experience)
```

```{r}
wr %>%
  filter(experience == 0) %>%
  mutate(top40 = ifelse(league_rank <= 40,1,0)) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            sum = sum(top40),
            ttl = sum(top40)/n())
```
